name: Cumberland River Behavioral Health - Capers Office
description: The Capers Office is an outpatient location of Cumberland River Behavioral Health (CRBH), a nonprofit community mental health center serving the eight-county area including Bell, Clay, Harlan, Jackson, Knox, Laurel, Rockcastle, and Whitley counties. This location provides outpatient mental health services including individual, group, and family counseling, psychiatric evaluation, medication management, and substance abuse treatment. Services are available to all age groups and payment is based on ability to pay.
source: Verified from official CRBH website and multiple online directories
hours: Monday through Friday, 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM
services: Outpatient mental health services, individual/group/family counseling, psychiatric evaluation, medication management, substance abuse treatment, crisis services
eligibility: All age groups, residents of the eight-county service area
notes: Fax: (606) 526-0723. This is one of 10 outpatient location sites operated by CRBH. The organization provides 24-hour crisis services and serves clients regardless of race, color, religion, or national origin. Payment is based on ability to pay.
